title: NotATether
author: NotATether
content: A While ago I symlinked Core 0.21.1 as my default bitcoin installation. I haven't touched it in a while, so I'd like to know whether I have to download a new version (or at least a newer minor revision) for it to recognize taproot versionbits or will my node be just fine if I stick to this version?The node is strictly for running Bitcoind: the wallet functionality is disabled.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: achow101 on May 19, 2022, 04:43:41 PM0.21.1 has the taproot deployment parameters.Thanks. Can confirm that I see the taproot softfork info inside a getblockchaininfo RPC call. Locking the thread now.
